ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Strategies
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve got armor that looks good *and* kicks ass. I got a Burynai Legion Gi for my cleric. He looked rather silly with the magic silk pants (which didn t show up
ygData.messageBody:
I've got armor that looks good *and* kicks ass. I got a Burynai Legion Gi
for my cleric. He looked rather silly with the magic silk pants (which
didn't show up so it looked like he was pantsless) and a dwarven ringmail
tunic. But now he looks really cool.
luv,
-Su

> Just stating I'd rather that my weapon/armor knocked em dead on the battle
> field then in a fashion show :> (sorry my TRY at wit)
>
> >On a side note the Kobolds near the king, maybe other places too I'm not
> > sure, drop some of THE BEST looking weapons in the game. Stats not too
> > good about like FS but the looks are great.
>
